CWEs: CWE-601: URL Redirection to Untrusted Site ('Open Redirect')
CWE-749: Exposed Dangerous Method or Function
description: The function is vulnerable to Open Redirect attacks because it uses the getScript() method to load a script from an external site. This could be manipulated to redirect users to a malicious site. It's also vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) because it submits forms without any CSRF tokens. This could allow an attacker to trick a user into performing actions they didn't intend to. The function also exposes dangerous methods or functions that could be exploited by an attacker.
